name: Simulate index matches overlapping legacy and composable templates

headers.warning: 299 Elasticsearch-9.2.0-e6d78b01c081f5a600a139159a72be1714c19054 "index template [v2_template] has index patterns [test*] matching patterns from existing older templates [v1_template] with patterns (v1_template => [test*, t1*]); this template [v2_template] will take precedence during new index creation"
